intro: This document serves as a comprehensive nomenclature guideline for the Copernicus Land Monitoring Service's Coastal Zones product, focusing on land cover and land use (LC/LU) classification. It provides detailed descriptions of all level 5 classes within the Coastal Zones LC/LU nomenclature, including their geographic characteristics, relevant input datasets, and interpretation methods. The guideline aims to ensure consistency and accuracy in mapping coastal environments across the EEA39 countries, supporting informed decision-making for coastal zone management and environmental monitoring.
